version_description:
■ Update contents
* Due to improvements of the settings features, the game settings will be reset to the default settings. Game progression will not be affected. Please re-apply the settings in game to your preferences after the update installation.

[Improvements and new features]
・ Tap sound volume adjustment feature added
・ Icon speed range increased
・ Tap timing adjustment range increased
・ Displays "Version History" on the setting screen
[Fixes and Game-balance changes]
・ Icon displacement,
　target BGM
　　　Follow the White Rabbit(Normal/Wizard/Ultimate)
　　　Revelation(Normal)
　　　Halcyon(Normal/Wizard)
　　　Kingdom(Normal/Wizard)
　　　I will never let you go(Normal/Wizard)
　　　Pulsar(Normal/Wizard/Ultimate)
　　　Peacock(Normal)
　　　Fairy Tale(Normal/Wizard)
　　　Downfall(Normal)
・Hold and release timing rebalanced
・Rhythm icon timing tweaks
・Other bug fixes
